siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt:
A dashboard is an essential part of Trafikito’s web interface. It shows the current status of your servers in addition
to log information recorded over time…
markdownRemark.html:
A dashboard is an essential part of Trafikito’s web interface. It shows the current status of your servers in addition to log information recorded over time.

The dashboard is fully customizable and can be arranged in a way that suits your needs for free. You can add data sources to your server, parse the output of any command running on your server, extract variables and display them on the dashboard.

You can select different display types for different data. The available display types are:

  • string
  • number
  • base
  • percent

You can start monitoring the output of any command, change which data to monitor by going to current data sources, from there, you will be able to create, edit or remove variables that are visible in the charts and text boxes within the single server view. To learn more, browse this support site or visit Trafikito’s Youtube channel.

frontmatter.title: Can I change the name of used variables?
